title: Coming Together
description: Pregnancy wasn’t in the cards until life sends them a surprise. Nikki believed that she had found the perfect distraction in the town heartthrob, but had run at the first sign of the two pink lines. She hadn’t planned on having second thoughts, until fear and love have her crawling back with her heart exposed.Austin can’t control his hurt and anger when Nikki returns after leaving him, but the pull and attraction becomes too much to ignore and he finds himself in her arms once again. He tries to push their past aside to focus on Nikki and the baby, but someone else wants to make sure that he isn’t around at all.
author: Renee Harless
